parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setTerrainGrid]], returns the current terrain grid. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getTerrainGrid''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - terrain grid value </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_terrainGrid = [[getTerrainGrid]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[getTerrainGrid]] < 50) [[then]]
{
   [[hint]] "Grass is enabled";
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setTerrainGrid]], [[viewDistance]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
